summary: GoCode Zone - A community learning platform for Go programming with courses, quizzes, tests, and Discord integration
architectural_notes: Multi-page website structure with Home, About, Course, Join Discord, and Privacy Policy as core pages
Course curriculum organized into 4 units with quizzes and tests
Optional VIP/Premium tier for advanced content

existing_features.title: Create a Home page featuring a hero section with the title 'Welcome to GoCode Zone', a subtitle describing the community as 'Learn Go from Beginner to Advanced', a prominent 'Join Discord' button, and a 'Why Join?' section listing at least 4 bullet points: Beginner-friendly lessons, Weekly quizzes & tests, Coding challenges, and Supportive community
Create an About page explaining what Go (Golang) is, what GoCode Zone is, and who the platform is for (Beginners, Students, Developers)

Create a Syllabus/Course page displaying 4 units with their titles and descriptions: Unit 1 – Getting Started, Unit 2 – Variables & Data Types, Unit 3 – If & Switch, Unit 4 – Loops. Each unit must show what learners will learn and mention that Quiz + Big Test are included
Create a Join/Discord page with a large 'Join Our Discord' button, Discord invite links, an explanation of what happens after joining, and a mention of community rules
Create a VIP/Premium page describing VIP membership benefits, pricing information, and extra features such as private help, advanced lessons, and projects
Create a Privacy Policy page with an effective date, contact method, and data handling explanation
Add a Testimonials section to display user feedback and community experiences
Add an FAQ section to answer common questions about the platform and courses
Add a Contact form allowing users to send messages or inquiries
Create a site-wide Footer component containing Discord link, website name 'GoCode Zone', current year, and link to Privacy Policy page
Implement site-wide navigation linking to all pages: Home, About, Course (Syllabus), Join Discord, VIP, Privacy Policy

Apply a cohesive visual design theme across all pages that conveys professionalism and approachability for a learning community, with consistent typography, color palette emphasizing trust and clarity, and clean layout patterns suitable for educational content
Update all Discord invite links throughout the site to use the new URL: https://discord.gg/y5EBSaf8r2
Update the contact email address displayed on the Contact page to gocodezone@googlegroups.com

new_feature_requests.summary: Home page with title, description, Join Discord button, and why-join bullet points
About page explaining Go, GoCode Zone, and target audience
Syllabus/Course page listing 4 units (Getting Started, Variables & Data Types, If & Switch, Loops) with descriptions and quiz/test mentions
Join/Discord page with Join Discord button, invite links, post-join explanation, and community rules
VIP/Premium page with pricing, features, and extra benefits
Privacy Policy page with effective date, contact method, and data handling explanation
Footer with Discord link, website name, year, and Privacy Policy link
Deploy the current GoCode Zone application to production on the Internet Computer mainnet
